metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9590 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: puppet-swift before versions 8.2.1, 9.4.4 is vulnerable to an information-disclosure in Red Hat OpenStack Platform director's installation of Object Storage (swift). During installation, the Puppet script responsible for deploying the service incorrectly removes and recreates the proxy-server.conf file with world-readable permissions.

criterions.comment: puppet-module-swift package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.4.4-1').
